item.title: Aurűk Religion
item.description: Deities The Aurűk’s primary deity was the Petrified Child; a figure they termed Stéyą. They venerated many other minor deities, all who represented the elements of the world that could be influenced by symbols.

item.title: History of the Morellic Minikin
item.description: Overview The Morellic race is a race of minikin descending from the Sarvaran, Aqhoran, and Corothic cultures. These cultures were forager nomads from the west, north, and east, who settled in the Sarvaran river basin due to it’s highly fertile soil and the Mora river’s seasonal flooding.

item.title: Morellic Clothing
item.description: Overview Morellic clothing is characterised by three things: Shape, Colour, and Material. These three elements come together to create a morellic garment.
